dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 consists of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. The dataset is commonly used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is similar to CIFAR-10 but contains 100 classes with 600 images each. The dataset is used for more fine-grained classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Yuval Netzer
Tao Wang
Adam Coates
Alessandro Bissacco
Bo Wu
Andrew Y Ng
dcterms:description: SVHN (Street View House Numbers) dataset contains over 600,000 digit images obtained from house numbers in Google Street View images. It is used for digit recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: SVHN

dcterms:creator: Omkar M Parkhi
Andrea Vedaldi
Andrew Zisserman
CV Jawahar
dcterms:description: The Pets dataset consists of images of cats and dogs, used for training models in pet classification tasks. It contains 37 categories of pets.
dcterms:title: Pets
